name: Save Andromeda
description:
Welcome to our Space Station Andromeda.

A few weeks ago an alien escaped from the laboratory of this station and infested the crew members.  Your job is to eliminate the aliens and to secure the station.

In this Space-Dungeon-Crawler you have to use your different weapons and tools in order to survive.
Manage your energy distribution  and upgrade your energy generator.

This game was made during a game-jam by 4p4che2017, Mr.Daredevil and Dr.Marksman, but unfortunately we did not finish in time. But now you can have fun with this more polished prototype.

We would be happy if you share your best time while collecting the treasure (and we like to hear your feedback).
